timeline.bodyText: Some changes are just Eclipse fixing formatting. Recommend Hide whitespace differences in Gear menu.
timeline.author: macchiati

timeline.bodyText: Add some explicit tests for logical groups, to make sure we have all and only the right paths.
timeline.author: macchiati

timeline.bodyText: Utility for comparison
timeline.author: macchiati

timeline.bodyText: New subtype, used for warnings.
timeline.author: macchiati
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -717,7 +717,7 @@ public CheckCLDR setCldrFileToCheck(CLDRFile cldrFileToCheck, Options options,
             invalidPlaceHolder, asciiQuotesNotAllowed, badMinimumGroupingDigits, inconsistentPeriods,
             inheritanceMarkerNotAllowed, invalidDurationUnitPattern, invalidDelimiter, illegalCharactersInPattern,
             badParseLenient, tooManyValues, invalidSymbol, invalidGenderCode,
-            mismatchedUnitComponent, longPowerWithSubscripts
+            mismatchedUnitComponent, longPowerWithSubscripts, largerDifferences

timeline.bodyText: add new test for count, count+case, and count+case+gender. Produces warning.
timeline.author: macchiati

timeline.bodyText: Utility for making sure we can see invisible differences.
timeline.author: macchiati

timeline.bodyText: Get the maximum difference among members of a logical group.
timeline.author: macchiati

timeline.bodyText: Fingerprint is a measure of a value's characters. Currently just a Multiset with counts for characters; later it could be more sophisticated.
timeline.author: macchiati

timeline.bodyText: Use a path link so we can link directly from a spreadsheet view.
timeline.author: macchiati
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1558,7 +1562,7 @@ private static void showValue(CLDRFile cldrFile, String prettyPath, String local
                     + "\t【" + example + "】"
                     + "\t⁅" + subType + "⁆"
                     + "\t❮" + statusString + "❯"
-                    + "\t" + fullPath
+                    + "\t" + pathLink

timeline.bodyText: Nothing but some immaterial formatting diffs.
timeline.author: macchiati

timeline.bodyText: Add check so it is safe to pass in null. Makes caller code simpler.
timeline.author: macchiati

timeline.bodyText: Optional parameter to return the type
timeline.author: macchiati

timeline.bodyText: extract method so we can call elsewhere.
timeline.author: macchiati

timeline.bodyText: Tweak the code to match what rawExtraPaths does.
timeline.author: macchiati

timeline.bodyText: Similar tweak to code.
timeline.author: macchiati

timeline.bodyText: Make sure we consider plurals, case, and gender equally.
timeline.author: macchiati

timeline.bodyText: Refactored code for just case.
timeline.author: macchiati

timeline.bodyText: refactored code to do all the grammatical features right.
timeline.author: macchiati

timeline.bodyText: Be more specific about handling the two kinds of unit lengths
timeline.author: macchiati

timeline.bodyText: This was a needless throw of an error. Null should just mean use default.
timeline.author: macchiati

timeline.bodyText: This line changed in order to get rid of merge conflicts.
timeline.author: macchiati
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -717,7 +717,7 @@ public CheckCLDR setCldrFileToCheck(CLDRFile cldrFileToCheck, Options options,
             invalidPlaceHolder, asciiQuotesNotAllowed, badMinimumGroupingDigits, inconsistentPeriods,
             inheritanceMarkerNotAllowed, invalidDurationUnitPattern, invalidDelimiter, illegalCharactersInPattern,
             badParseLenient, tooManyValues, invalidSymbol, invalidGenderCode,
-            mismatchedUnitComponent, longPowerWithSubscripts, gapsInPlaceholderNumbers, duplicatePlaceholders
+            mismatchedUnitComponent, longPowerWithSubscripts, gapsInPlaceholderNumbers, duplicatePlaceholders, largerDifferences
